title: Package "Basic-Plan "
subTitle: Free 30-minute trial
description: Book a free 30-minute trial and show your child that learning Tamil can be fun and exciting!

title: Package "Mid Range Plan"
subTitle: Pay as you go
description: Is your child’s schedule already packed? Opt for the 'Get In touch' option to book Tamil classes that fit their learning needs and offer flexibility week after week.

title: Package "Value Added Pack"
subTitle: Monthly subscription
description: Have a young Tamil language enthusiast eager to dive deeper into Tamil stories and culture? Choose the monthly subscription and let them tailored for their passion.
